text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom kmean lotthopheap phdal phl brayoch samreab khluon robsakhnhom ning rounhochran pheap krohthnak chenh pi khluon khnhom ban laey leuklengte avei del a l laoh mean chetnea bonnaoh . brasenbae khnhom ban doeng nei athrkambang khnhom pitchea nung bangkeun nouv ampeula yeangochraen haey kmean ampeuaeakrak na mk bietbien roub khnhom ban laey . khnhom kmeanoavei krawpi chea anak dasatuen promean ning phdal dam am noeng rikreay dl krom del mean chomnue noh laey
